# PromotionOptions



### promotionConditions

{{< member-info type="Array&#60;PromotionCondition&#60;any&#62;&#62;" >}}

An array of conditions which can be used to construct Promotions

{{< member-info type="Array&#60;PromotionAction&#60;any&#62;&#62;" >}}
